name: Monikon Partitiivi
description:
Once upon a time a young french artist, attracted by the charms of a weird gelatine flower (no kink shaming please), tried to move in Finland. To succesfully integrate he  learned the language... At the beginning everything went fine : sauna, känni, metsäretki...The gelatine flower and the french sausage were happy... But a beast was hidden in the shadows, ready to tear in pieces the frail sanity of the poor young man... The indicible aberration from outerspace, MONIKON PARTITIIVIIIIIIIIIII jumped out of the language book, jiggling its 50 differents faces...

-loja -luja -luita...

Inside the poor boy's brain the total chaos beginned  to burst out of control...

-ioita -ejä -eita... 

The doomed weakling could'nt found sleep anymore, tormented and shivering incessantly in the twilight...  

- An extract from the evil book "Mamun Kirous"

A4 drawing, 2016
